lines.text: Ah, white men! Welcome to Humuhumunukunukuapua'a-a-a-a-a Island.

[in subtitled "Hawaiian"]
What's up, Doc? Now is the time for every good man to come to the aid of his party.

[points at said subtitle]
Gee, did you say that?

[hallucinating the fat castaway is a sandwich]
And... hold the onions.
We're gonna have roast rabbit! We're gonna have roast rabbit!
